unnormalised: Heard Dr. Sharma from AIIMS speak yesterday. What a powerful presentation! I mean, Prof. Kumar also had some interesting points, but Dr. Sharma really broke down the research in a way even I could understand. She said something about collaborating with Mr. Singh from the ISRO team... which would be huge! Honestly, thought Ms. Khan's intro was a bit too long though - we were all waiting for Dr. Sharma to take the stage.
normalised: Heard Doctor Sharma from A-I-I-M-S speak yesterday. What a powerful presentation! I mean, Professor Kumar also had some interesting points, but Doctor Sharma really broke down the research in a way even I could understand. She said something about collaborating with Mister Singh from the I-S-R-O team... which would be huge! Honestly, thought Miss Khan's intro was a bit too long though - we were all waiting for Doctor Sharma to take the stage.
